content: i created this pattern because i wanted a pair of practical fingerless gloves for personal use that worked up quickly and weren t needlessly ornate i love my gloves so much i ve already made several pairs for friends and family who also love them and decided to share the pattern here for anyone else who may want to make a pair this pattern will make an average woman s size pair of fingerless gloves it s very easy to adjust to a larger or smaller size by simply adding or subtracting a few stitches
